alert.note: Alert for Holt; Nodaway (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 12 at 11:14PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Doniphan, western Atchison, Holt and southwestern Nodaway Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1114 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Maitland, or 8 miles northeast of Mound City, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mound City, Highland, Oregon, Effingham, Maitland, Skidmore, Forest City, Craig, White Cloud, Muscotah, Denton, Graham, Big Lake, Severance, Huron, Leona, Fortescue, Bigelow, Arrington and Iowa Point. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 73 and 95. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northeastern Kansas...and northwestern Missouri.
